about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, Jalan Transolutions (India) Limited is engaged in the business of automobile transportation. They provides transportation logistics services in the B2B domain across India in all major sectors of the industry especially for 2 wheelers transportation.

Jalan Transolutions offers services for carry goods from manufacturers to dealers or wholesalers and from wholesalers to retails mainly in automobiles industry (in two
wheelers segment). They own about 400 fleet of trucks with GPS equipped and they also hire third party transportation service for carrying out their logistics operations.

In 2015 in association with "Ashok Leyland Ltd" & "JK Tyres Ltd", they have set up a fully equipped, 29,365 sq. ft. buildup area) workshop known as "Jalan Business Center". This is a Truck Service Station for trucks repair, maintenance and breakdown solutions having latest machines, updated techniques, and team of experts at Dharuhera, Haryana.

contactDetails.full_address: Jalan Transolutions (India) Ltd, 206 Ajnara Bhawan, D-Block Market, Vivek Vihar

faqs.question: What is the Jalan Transolutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Jalan Transolutions IPO is a SME IPO of 3849000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹17.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹46 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on May 18, 2017, and closes on May 23, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Jalan Transolutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Jalan Transolutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Jalan Transolutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Jalan Transolutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Jalan Transolutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Jalan Transolutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Jalan Transolutions IPO opens on May 18, 2017 and closes on May 23, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Jalan Transolutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Jalan Transolutions IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,38,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Jalan Transolutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Jalan Transolutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
